value.title: Monitor usage with Power BI audit logs
value.excerpt: You can turn on audit logs in Power BI to monitor what users are doing in Power BI. This tool is perfect for troubleshoot and to help you document what is being done in Power BI and use it to comply with laws like GDPR.  To turn it on, you need an E3 or E5 office 365 license. value.title: Show rows with no data - Power BI Tips & Tricks #33
value.excerpt: By default, column headings are only displayed in your reports if they contain data. value.title: What is Vertipaq and how does it work? Part 1: Data compression
value.excerpt: What is Vertipaq and how does it work? Part 1: Data compression Vertipaq is the database and engine that runs on top of Power BI and PowerPivot.   When we import data in Power BI, the Vertipaq database will try with a series of algorithms, to compress the data as much as possible and the best way possible
